sentences.english: Surrounded by guardsoul the little guy can perish the old guy thoroughly.
sentences.chinese: 被守護魄環繞着的小傢伙能徹底毀滅老傢伙。

sentences.english: The darker the shadows of sorrow become the more brightly the lamp of love shines.
sentences.chinese: 表達愛心的最好方平魄幫助比我們更加不幸的人。

definition: soul/spirit/immortal soul, i.e. that can be detached from the body
stars of the Big Dipper that constitute the tail of the dipper
three immortal souls in Daoism, representing spirit and intellect
seven mortal forms in Daoism, representing carnal life and desires/contrasted with 三魂 three immortal souls
to bend/to violate/to go against/ruthless and tyrannical
the Yellow Springs/the underworld of Chinese mythology/the equivalent of Hades or Hell
